answers.answer: It just means you need to drink more. If you're dehydrated your body tells you by making you thirsty.

No it comes in spurts. Sometimes I am sometime I'm not.  Not to scare you or anything but my mom is diabetic and that was actually 1 of her symptoms.  Are you far long enough for the gestational diabetes test?

Its normal, your body needs more water due to all the extra activities going on. My doctor asked me how many bottles of water I drink daily. I told him about 4. He told me to double that amount. Also, he said if I'm ever thirsty that's not go, because more than likely I'm dehydrated. So basically we must drink lots of water, because our body needs it all. Good luck!
